backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, access control, friend requests, and user search with blob storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping branding‑related requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of main frontend components, hooks, styling, and index files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining warm color tokens and light/dark theme variables using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entrypoint with Tchat-branded document title and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile setup, navigation dialogs, room selection, and global layout branding for Tchat.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with React Query cache clearing and status handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/InviteToRoo: Dialog for inviting friends to a chat room, showing friend profiles and performing room membership mutations.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Provides a form to compose and send chat messages with optional image upload, preview, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageThre: Displays messages for a room with auto-scrolling, sender info, image rendering, and a composer for new messages.
frontend/src/components/chat/RoomList.ts: Lists chat rooms and allows creating new ones, selecting rooms, and viewing basic room metadata.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsD: Shows a dialog for viewing friends, searching users, and sending friend requests with profile previews.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Lets users edit their profile details, avatar color, and profile picture with image upload and preview handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Initial setup dialog where new users enter basic profile information and save it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar using a profile image when available or falls back to a styled initial-based avatar.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Provides a dialog for adjusting theme and message polling interval, saving changes through form submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatRooms.ts: Hooks for listing chat rooms and creating new ones, updating cached room data after mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useFriends.ts: Hooks for searching users, fetching friends, and handling friend request actions with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMembers.ts: Mutation hook for adding users to a room and refreshing the room list afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMessages.ts: Hooks for fetching room messages with optional polling and posting new messages with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserPreferences.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for retrieving and updating user profiles, including the caller's profile and specific user profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus light and dark theme CSS variables defining the app’s color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root and wraps it with query and identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing them as needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom themes, colors, fonts, container settings, plugins, and animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, including versioning, feature definitions, architectural notes, and requirements mappings.
